title: Sandy Hook parents sue InfoWars' Alex Jones for defamation
text:
Sandy Hook parents sue InfoWars' Alex Jones for defamation 3:25am IST - 01:25 
The parents of two children killed in the 2012 Sandy Hook school massacre have sued conspiracy theorist Alex Jones for defamation, accusing him and his website InfoWars of engaging in a campaign of “false, cruel, and dangerous assertions.”   
The parents of two children killed in the 2012 Sandy Hook school massacre have sued conspiracy theorist Alex Jones for defamation, accusing him and his website InfoWars of engaging in a campaign of “false, cruel, and dangerous assertions.”  //reut.rs/2qGC0VR
